java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.internal.core.SourceMethod
	at org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.internal.core.SourceField.getPrimaryElement(SourceField.java:129)
	at org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.internal.core.JavaElement.getPrimaryElement(JavaElement.java:343)
	at org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.internal.debug.ui.BreakpointUtils.getBreakpointResource(BreakpointUtils.java:88)

fixed, was caused by adding local vars to the model, removed them
